Exciting is a digital product development and prototyping studio. We build software and tinker in hardware. We explore the potential of simple systems. Such as…

Harmonia

Stronger teams through shared responsibility

Non-hierarchical team structures can produce teams with more motivation and higher morale. But without a traditional manager, how can you ensure that tasks are really getting done?

Harmonia is our answer, intelligently assigning responsibilities for tasks as required, promoting engagement across the team whilst giving visibility of progress across the whole team.

Find out more…
